successes.title: OSTRICH PILLOW
successes.description: OSTRICH PILLOW offers a micro environment in which to take a comfortable power nap in the office, travelling or wherever you want.

Pledges.description: Hey you early birds, That was quick. You’re awesome! Nap-Olympic  Champions deserve an OSTRICH PILLOW with (Free shipping to USA, $20 for shipping to Canada or $15 for international shipping).

‘If you are going to get one thing to help you on your napping way, make it the Ostrich Pillow’ – Ali.  Thanks you lovely folk, let’s get the napping going! You will receive 1 ORIGINAL OSTRICH PILLOW (Add $15 for shipping to USA, $20 for shipping to Canada or $25 for international shipping).

Now that’s what we’re talking about! You are onto a winner! What’s better than a nap? Synchronised napping ! You will receive 2 ORIGINAL OSTRICH PILLOWS, one for you, one for a friend or family, you decide. (Add $20 for shipping to USA, $25 for shipping to Canada or $30 for international shipping).

Hey, you are too kind. So you want to get a bunch to share with your family or friends? Maybe start some napping flash mobs? To get that going, you will receive 5 ORIGINAL OSTRICH PILLOWS (Add $25 for shipping to USA, $35 for shipping to Canada or $40 for international shipping).

Thanks! You are truly brilliant! Welcome to our Ostrich Pillow family. You will receive 10 ORIGINAL OSTRICH PILLOWS (Add $40 for shipping to USA, $60 for shipping to Canada or $85 for international shipping). Wanting to start an Ostrich Pillow community with friends? Send us your pictures of your group napping moments and we will put them on our site. For distributers, your store will be featured on our website.
